General.Name: OPC Energy Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: OPC Energy Ltd. owns, develops, and operates power generation facilities in Israel. It operates rotem power plant with an installed capacity of 466 megawatts (MW); and a natural gas-fired open-cycle power station, as well as hadera power plant with an installed capacity of 144 MW. The company was formerly known as IC Power Israel Ltd. and changed its name to OPC Energy Ltd. in July 2017. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel. OPC Energy Ltd. is a subsidiary of Kenon Holdings Ltd.
General.Address: Azrieli Tower Sharona, Tel Aviv, Israel, 6701203
